verbs.description: [V: astros] bullpen implodes as red sox take 2 - 1 lead in alcs roberto osuna shuffled silently from the field on which he imploded his head hung he toted a tan mitt in the right hand which gave away the game and control of the american league championship series a sellout crowd thinned those who remained houston steve pearce dallas keuchel marwin gonzalez jose altuve devers boston red sox mlb com george springer brian mccann intern lsu nathan eovaldi nolan ryan jackie bradley sox nick saban joe smith righthander houston astros chandler rome a j hinch rafael devers osuna nate eovaldi j d martinez major league baseball boston rice tigers texas ray bullpens houston chronicle astros eovaldi blue jay a j hinch baseball roberto osuna red sox brock holt mitch moreland toronto tuscaloosa bogaerts official alex bregman statcast steve pearce baseball american league alabama xander bogaerts yankees
